note:

the Attack command.

name: Guard

description: Causes enemies to flee.
name: Banish

description: Reveals enemy information.
name: Libra
note:
<Party Limit Cost: 1>

<Before Eval>
if (target.isEnemy()) {
  var id = target._enemyId;
  $gameSystem.addHpGaugeEnemy(id);

  var text = target.name() + '\n';
  text += '\\px[100]\\c[4]HP:\\c[0] ' + target.hp;
  text += '/' + target.mhp;
  text += '\\px[400]\\c[4]MP:\\c[0] ' + target.mp;
  text += '/' + target.mmp;
  text += '\\px[700]\\c[4]TP:\\c[0] ' + target.tp;
  text += '\n';
  text += '\\px[100]\\c[4]ATK:\\c[0] ' + target.atk;
  text += '\\px[400]\\c[4]MAT:\\c[0] ' + target.mat;
  text += '\\px[700]\\c[4]AGI:\\c[0] ' + target.agi;
  text += '\n';
  text += '\\px[100]\\c[4]DEF:\\c[0] ' + target.def;
  text += '\\px[400]\\c[4]MDF:\\c[0] ' + target.mdf;
  text += '\\px[700]\\c[4]LUK:\\c[0] ' + target.luk;
  $gameMessage.add(text);
 
  var weakness = '';
  var resist = '';
  var immune = '';
  var absorb = '';
  var elements = $dataSystem.elements;
  for (var i = 1; i < elements.length; ++i) {
    var name = elements[i];
    var rate = target.elementRate(i);
    if (rate > 1) {
      weakness += name + ' ';
    } else if (rate < 0) {
      absorb += name + ' ';
    } else if (rate === 0) {
      immune += name + ' ';
    } else if (rate < 1) {
      resist += name + ' ';
    }
  }
  if (weakness === '') weakness = 'None';
  if (resist === '') resist = 'None';
  if (immune === '') immune = 'None';
  if (absorb === '') absorb = 'None';
  weakness = '\\c[4]Weakness:\\c[0] ' + weakness + '\n';
  resist = '\\c[4]Resist:\\c[0] ' + resist + '\n';
  immune = '\\c[4]Immune:\\c[0] ' + immune + '\n';
  absorb = '\\c[4]Absorb:\\c[0] ' + absorb;
  text = weakness + resist + immune + absorb;
  $gameMessage.add(text);
}
</Before Eval>

description: Deal up to five physical attacks to one target, healing the user for a portion of the damage dealt. The number of attacks dealt depends on the user's Agility.
name: Thief's Revenge
note:
<Custom Target Eval>
var hits = Math.floor(user.agi / 34);
hits = hits.clamp(1, 5);
this._totalThiefDamage = 0;
this._currentThiefHits = 0;
this._totalThiefHits = hits;
while (hits--) {
  targets.push(target);
}
</Custom Target Eval>

<Select Conditions>
Front Row Only
</Select Conditions>

<After Eval>
var result = target.result();
if (result.isHit()) {
  this._totalThiefDamage += result.hpDamage;
}
this._currentThiefHits += 1;
if (this._currentThiefHits >= this._totalThiefHits) {
  var rate = 0.30;
  var heal = Math.ceil(this._totalThiefDamage * rate);
  $gameVariables.setValue(21, heal);
}
</After Eval>

note:
<Command Text: Attack>
<Display Text: Attack>

<Setup action>
display action
</Setup action>

<Whole Action>
perform start
motion standby: user
wait for movement
</Whole Action>

<Target action>
face user: target
motion attack: user
wait: 10
if target.isStateAffected(5)
 force critical
 animation 12: target
else 
 action animation: target
end
wait for animation
action effect
normal critical
</Target action>

<Select Conditions>
Any Row
</Select Conditions>

description: If user defeats an enemy, additional items are gained from the target.
name: Poach
note:
<After Eval>
if (user.isActor() && target.isEnemy() && (target.isDead() || target.hp <= 0)) {
  var id = target.enemyId();
  var pool = [];
  pool.push($dataItems[1]);
  pool.push($dataItems[2]);
  pool.push($dataItems[3]);
  if (id === 1) {
    pool.push($dataWeapons[1]);
  } else if (id === 2) {
    pool.push($dataWeapons[2]);
    pool.push($dataWeapons[3]);
  } else if (id === 3) {
    pool.push($dataArmors[1]);
    pool.push($dataArmors[2]);
    pool.push($dataArmors[3]);
  }
  var item = pool[Math.floor(Math.random() * pool.length)];
  if (item) {
    target.startAnimation(2);
    target.removeImmortal();
    SoundManager.playShop();
    $gameParty.gainItem(item, 1);
    var msg = '<CENTER>' + user.name() + ' acquired \\i[' + item.iconIndex + ']' + item.name + ' from ' + target.name() + '!';
    var wait = 60;
    BattleManager.addText(msg, wait);
  }
}
</After Eval>

wait for movement

<Target action>

motion attack: user
wait: 10

 force critical
 animation 12: target }
else 
 action animation: target
end
wait for animation
action effect
normal critical
</Target action>

<Select Conditions>
Any Row
